problems.solution: To register a new user, log in as an admin, go to 'UserManagement' section, click 'Add New User', and fill in the details like name, contact, and room preferences. Then, click 'Submit'.
To check a boarder's payment history, contact admin for check all the past payments.
To add a new facility, go to 'Post Property',and enter the details like room type, amenities, and pricing. Then, save the room.
To process early check-out, open the boarder's profile, click 'Process Early Check-out', adjust billing if necessary, and finalize the check-out.
